name: Devilator
overview: The objective of Devilator is to control the boarding / off boarding of passengers on an elevator that moves between 5 floors under your control with the joystick. Passengers will pile up on the right side with a number indicating your level, you can move the elevator to them with up/down, then use left/right to pull a passenger onto the elevator or push them off to the correct floor. The passengers pile up quite fast so the challenge is whether you can keep ahead before a lane on a particular floor fills up.
